title: Two new fonts
content:
The first, called snug, is a mini bitmap for gaming use. The Second, called woman, is more a bitmap display font. Was bored at work with MS Paint.   
   
 ![snug](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414213833im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/2505.gif)   
 ![woman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414213833im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/2506.gif)   
Please critique.   
Matthew
author: matthew_dob

comments.content:
the x on the second font doesnt feel comfortable   
i like the a,g,r,q on woman a lot

I think the x works quite well. Both fonts   
are nice. If you had posted numerals, one   
could see if there was a problem with the   
'g' in woman. ;)
ja, i think this X fits more into it
